alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Laclede; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 1:02AM CST until February 16 at 1:45AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wright County in southwestern Missouri... Northeastern Douglas County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Laclede County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 145 AM CST. * At 101 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Conway to near Hartville to near Mansfield to 12 miles south of Ava, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mountain Grove, Ava, Morgan, Mansfield, Conway, Dawson, Norwood, Hartville, Twin Bridges, Competition, Manes, Brushyknob, Lynchburg, Graff, Grovespring, Falcon, Vanzant and Dry Knob. This includes Interstate 44 near mile marker 144. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
